mapper.insert: insert into ext_eproduct_c (EXT_EPRODUCT_ID, FACTORY_ID, EXPORT_PRODUCT_ID, CTYPE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_DESC, LOADING_RATE, PACKING_UNIT, CNUMBER, OUT_NUMBER, FINISHED, GROSS_WEIGHT, NET_WEIGHT, SIZE_LENGTH, SIZE_WIDTH, SIZE_HEIGHT, PRODUCT_REQUEST, PRICE, AMOUNT, CUNIT, BOX_NUM, EX_PRICE, EX_UNIT, NO_TAX, TAX, COST_PRICE, COST_TAX, ORDER_NO, ACCESSORIES) values( #{id}, #{factoryId}, #{ExportProductId}, #{ctype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadingRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packingUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grossWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sizeLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sizeWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sizeHeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{exUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accessories,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into ext_eproduct_c (EXT_EPRODUCT_ID, FACTORY_ID, EXPORT_PRODUCT_ID, CTYPE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_DESC, LOADING_RATE, PACKING_UNIT, CNUMBER, OUT_NUMBER, FINISHED, GROSS_WEIGHT, NET_WEIGHT, SIZE_LENGTH, SIZE_WIDTH, SIZE_HEIGHT, PRODUCT_REQUEST, PRICE, AMOUNT, CUNIT, BOX_NUM, EX_PRICE, EX_UNIT, NO_TAX, TAX, COST_PRICE, COST_TAX, ORDER_NO, ACCESSORIES)
( select #{item.id}, #{item.factoryId}, #{item.ExportProductId}, #{item.ctype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loadingRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.packingUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.outNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.finished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.grossWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.sizeLength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.sizeWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.sizeHeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.productRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.cunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.boxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.exUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.noTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.tax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.costTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.accessories,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual )
